def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = input()

    if n == 1:
        print("YES")
        print("abc")
        return

    if s[0] == s[1]:
        if t[0] == t[1]:
            print("NO")
            return
        else:
            print("YES")
            print("{}{}{}{}{}{}".format(s[0], s[1], t[0], t[1], t[0], t[1]))
            return
    if t[0] == t[1]:
        print("YES")
        print("{}{}{}{}{}{}".format(t[0], t[1], s[0], s[1], s[0], s[1]))
        return

    for c in "abc":
        if c not in s and c not in t:
            print("YES")
            print("{}{}{}{}{}{}".format(s[0], s[1], t[0], t[1], c, c))
            return

    print("NO")

main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    t = input()
    if (s == t):
        print("NO")
        return
    if (n == 1):
        print("YES")
        print(s[0] + s[1] + t[0])
        return
    if (s[0] == t[0]):
        print("YES")
        print(s[1]*n + t[1]*n + s[0]*n)
        return
    if (s[1] == t[1]):
        print("YES")
        print(s[0]*n + t[0]*n + s[1]*n)
        return
    if (s[0] == t[1]):
        print("YES")
        print(s[1]*n + s[0]*n + t[0]*n)
        return
    if (s[1] == t[0]):
        print("YES")
        print(s[0]*n + t[1]*n + s[1]*n)
        return
    print("NO")

if (__name__ == "__main__"):
    main()
